help.command-description: Get info on all the commands in the server!
help.command-reply:
Well, for one, you can *type slash and look at the decriptions under all of the commands* but this is just for your convinence!

`/help` Gives this dialog
`/info <param>` Gives the channel a bit of info about the server!
`/ping` A simple command for testing.
`/report`  A method to report someone. 
`/verify` Use this to apply for a whitelist!

 Why did i make this it just took a while.

whitelist.title: Whitelist Info
whitelist.text: In order to get whitelisted, visit #server-info

suggestion.title: Suggestion Info
suggestion.text: In order to make a suggestion, visit https://forms.gle/m8UoQtw6FAEprMiF8
